Team Up
01
TEAM UP: EXCALIBUR THEMED TEAM: [After establishing themed teams, if Rachel Grey is part of a listed theme team, you may use the following effect:] If 4+ friendly characters with the Excalibur keyword are on the map, they can't be targeted by opposing characters 5+ squares away. (After replacing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a a name).
02
TEAM UP: X-MEN OR FUTURE THEMED TEAM: [After establishing themed teams, if Rachel Grey is part of a listed theme team, you may use the following effect:] When Rachel Grey attacks only characters that can use Probability Control, each target can't use Probability Control until your next turn. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name).
